comment:
* A class containing information about the current state of device policies (e.g. values set by
 * different admins, info about the enforcing admins, resolved policy, etc).
 *
 * @hide

methods.name: public Map<UserHandle, Map<PolicyKey, PolicyState<?>>> getPoliciesForAllUsers()
methods.comment:
* Returns a {@link Map} of current policies for each {@link UserHandle}, note that users * that do not have any policies set will not be included in the returned map. * *

If the device has global policies affecting all users, it will be returned under * {@link UserHandle#ALL}.

methods.name: public Map<PolicyKey, PolicyState<?>> getPoliciesForUser(@NonNull UserHandle user)
methods.comment:
* Returns a {@link Map} of current policies for the provided {@code user}, use
     * {@link UserHandle#ALL} to get global policies affecting all users on the device.

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)

methodNames: public Map<PolicyKey, PolicyState<?>> getPoliciesForUser(@NonNull UserHandle user)
public void writeToParcel(@NonNull Parcel dest, int flags)
